creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Carol Brooks
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Seals, and Stickers 

URQ: [  渓水試茗図  ]  (Tasting tea with water of a mountain torrent)
markings: URQ: [肅田]; [ 半江？]; yellow sticker L roller end: [E5]; white sticker L roller end: [SJ/29]
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and light color on paper
signed: URQ: [ □□半江田肅写於花月庵東軒 ]
title: Autumn Landscape with Three Scholars by a River Tasting tea with water of a mountain torrent
